question: To which of the following Nirmal Hriday, Sanjiwini and Saheli belongs?
option2: herbal medicines produced in India for hypertension, heart disturbances and neurological problems
option3: names of some savings schemes mooted by nationalised banks
option4: institutions set up by Jayaprakash Narayan for the rehabilitation of erstwhile dacoits
explanation: Nirmal Hriday, Sanjiwini and Saheli are organisations engaged in social work which were started by Mother Teressa.
